All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountNotActivatedException
Exception evoked when the account user is not activated yet.
ApiError
ApiError is a record used to send error information from the backend to the frontend.
AuthController
This controller manages authentication.
BaseEntity
This is a base entity class that includes common fields for all entities.
BCryptUtil
This class helps to hash passwords and check them.
Bill
This class represents a bill and extends the BaseEntity class.
BillRepository
Repository for managing Bill entities.
BillService
Service interface for managing bills.
BillServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing bills.
Category
This class represents a category of items and extends the BaseEntity class.
CategoryAssembler
CategoryAssembler is a class that helps to convert CategoryDto objects into EntityModel objects.
CategoryController
This controller manages categories Display the list of categories
CategoryDto
Data Transfert Object (DTO) for a Category This class is used to transfer category data (id and name) between layers
CategoryException
This is a general exception for category errors.
CategoryExistException
Exception evoked when a category already exist
CategoryForm
Record CategoryForm into a Category entity
CategoryNotFoundException
Exception evoked when list of categories are empty
CategoryRepository
Repository for managing Category entities.
CategoryService
Service interface for managing category.
CategoryServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing category.
CorsConfig
This class configures Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) for the application.
CustomUserDetailsService
This class loads user details from the database using the username (pseudo).
EmailController
This controller manages email.
EmailExistException
Exception evoked when the email address of a user already exists.
EmailNotFoundException
Exception evoked when the email from the user doesn't exist.
EmailService
Service interface for managing email.
EmailServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing email Import method EmailService
EmailTokenDTO
Data for email token.
Favor
This class represents a favor (service or item) and extends the BaseEntity class.
FavorAssembler
FavorAssembler is a class that helps to convert FavorDto or FavorByIdDto objects into EntityModel objects.
FavorByIdDto
A dto (Data Transfer Object) for a favor information.
FavorController
This controller manages favour Display the list of favour Get a favor by identifier Create a new favor Edit a favor Delete a favor List a list of favour by category
FavorDto
A dto (Data Transfer Object) for favor information It contains simple data about the favor (name of service)
FavorException
This is a general class for exception Favor errors
FavorExistException
Exception evoked when favor is already exist
FavorForm
Record FavorForm to save into a Favor Entity
FavorNotFoundException
Exception evoked when favor is not found
FavorRepository
Repository for managing Favor entities.
FavorService
Service interface for managing favor.
FavorServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing favor.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for the application.
InvalidPasswordException
This exception is thrown when a password is invalid.
JwtConfig
This class is for JWT (JSON Web Token) configuration.
JwtFilter
This filter checks each HTTP request for a JWT token.
JwtUtil
This class helps with JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
Material
This class represents a material (item or resource) and extends the BaseEntity class.
MaterialAssembler
MaterialAssembler is a class that helps to convert MaterialDto or MaterialByIdDto objects into EntityModel objects.
MaterialByIdDto
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) for material information.
MaterialController
This controller manages materials Display the list of materials Get by identifier Create a new material Edit a material Delete a material List a list of material by category
MaterialDto
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) for material information.
MaterialException
This is a general class exception for material errors.
MaterialExistException
Exception evoked when the material exist already
MaterialForm
Record MaterialForm to save into a Material entity
MaterialNotFoundException
Exception evoked when the material is empty
MaterialRepository
Repository for managing Material entities.
MaterialService
Service interface for managing material.
MaterialServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing material.
OpenApiConfig
Configuration class for OpenAPI (Swagger) documentation.

User
This class represents a user and extends the BaseEntity class.
UserAssembler
UserAssembler is a class that helps to convert UserDto objects into EntityModel objects.
UserController
This controller manages users Display the profile user Update the profile from user Delete the account by id List of roles Change only password

UserDto is a data transfer object for user information.
UserException
This is a general exception for user errors.

Repository for managing User entities.

UserRoleDto is a data transfer object for role from user It holds user details like name, firstname, role and created

Service interface for managing user.
UserServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing users.
UserTokenDTO
This class holds user data and a token.
